title: 77/711/EEC: Commission Decision of 4 November 1977 determining the regions in which the co-responsibility levy introduced in respect of milk and milk products by Regulation (EEC) No 1822/77 is not applicable (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 4 November 1977  determining the regions in which the co-responsibility levy introduced in respect of milk and milk products by Regulation (EEC) No 1822/77 is not applicable  (Only the Italian text is authentic)  (77/711/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The regions meeting the conditions referred to in Article 1 (4) of Regulation (EEC) No 1822/77 are listed in the Annex.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 November 1977.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President
ANNEX
>PIC FILE= "T0010597">(1)OJ No L 131, 26.5.1977, p. 6. (2)OJ No L 203, 9.8.1977, p. 1. (3)OJ No L 282, 5.11.1977, p. 8.
